Uses of Class
camzup.core.Curve2.Knot2

Packages that use Curve2.Knot2 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Curve2.Knot2 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Curve2.Knot2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.alignHandles​(Vec2 rearDir, Vec2 foreDir, Vec2 rearScaled)
    Aligns this knot's handles in the same direction while preserving their magnitude.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.alignHandlesBackward​(Vec2 foreDir, Vec2 rearDir, Vec2 foreScaled)
    Aligns this knot's fore handle to its rear handle while preserving magnitude.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.alignHandlesForward​(Vec2 rearDir, Vec2 foreDir, Vec2 rearScaled)
    Aligns this knot's rear handle to its fore handle while preserving magnitude.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.clone()
    Creates a new knot with the coordinate and handles of this knot.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.eval​(float step, Curve2.Knot2 target)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0], returning a knot on the curve.
    static Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.fromPolar​(float angle, float radius, float handleMag, Curve2.Knot2 target)
    Creates a knot from polar coordinates, where the knot's fore handle is tangent to the radius.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.get​(int i)
    Gets a knot from the curve by an index.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.getFirst()
    Gets the first knot in the curve.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.getLast()
    Gets the last knot in the curve.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandles()
    Mirrors this knot's handles.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandles​(Vec2 temp)
    Mirrors this knot's handles.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandlesBackward()
    Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandlesBackward​(Vec2 rearDir)
    Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandlesForward()
    Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.mirrorHandlesForward​(Vec2 foreDir)
    Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.removeFirst()
    Returns and removes the first knot in the curve.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.removeLast()
    Removes and returns the last knot in the curve.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.reverse()
    Reverses the knot's direction by swapping the fore- and rear-handles.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot around the z axis by an angle in radians.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.rotateZ​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates a knot around the z axis.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.scale​(float scale)
    Scales this knot by a factor.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.scale​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales this knot by a non-uniform scalar.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.scaleForeHandleBy​(float scalar, Vec2 temp0, Vec2 temp1)
    Scales the fore handle by a factor.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.scaleForeHandleTo​(float magnitude, Vec2 temp0, Vec2 temp1)
    Scales the fore handle to a magnitude.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.scaleHandlesBy​(float scalar, Vec2 temp0, Vec2 temp1)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle by a factor.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.scaleHandlesTo​(float magnitude, Vec2 temp0, Vec2 temp1)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle to a magnitude.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.scaleRearHandleBy​(float scalar, Vec2 temp0, Vec2 temp1)
    Scales the rear handle by a factor.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.scaleRearHandleTo​(float magnitude, Vec2 temp0, Vec2 temp1)
    Scales the rear handle to a magnitude
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord)
    Sets the coordinate, fore and rear handles to the input coordinate.

    Sets the knot's coordinates and fore handle.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float xFore, float yFore, float xRear, float yRear)
    Sets the knot's coordinate, forehandle and rearhandle by component.

    Sets this knot from a source knot.
    Curve2.Knot2 Curve2.Knot2.set​(Vec2 coord)
